explains: adj. 糖尿病的，患糖尿病的
wordGroup: diabetic retinopathy 糖尿病视网膜病变
diabetic ketoacidosis 糖尿病酮症酸中毒；糖尿病酮酸症；糖尿病酮酸中毒
diabetic coma 糖尿病性昏睡；糖尿病昏迷症

sentences.en: He was diagnosed (as) a diabetic when he was 64.
sentences.cn: 他64岁时被诊断患有糖尿病。

sentences.en: Diabetic neuropathy is damage to the nerves as a result of diabetes, and affects up to 50% of people with diabetes.
sentences.cn: 糖尿病神经病变是由于糖尿病对神经的损害，并影响高达50%的糖尿病患者。

sentences.en: He found her in a diabetic coma.
sentences.cn: 他发现她因糖尿病而昏迷。
